actions.command: execute if entity @s[tag=portal1] as @e[distance=0.01..,tag=portal2] run execute if score @s ratatoskr_portal = @e[limit=1,sort=nearest,tag=portal1] ratatoskr_portal run function hypno:portal_tp
execute if entity @s[tag=portal1] run playsound minecraft:entity.enderman.teleport player @a ~ ~ ~ 1 2
execute if entity @s[tag=portal1] run playsound bettercombat:wand_swing player @a ~ ~ ~ 1 0.5
execute if entity @s[tag=portal1] at @s run particle minecraft:dust_color_transition 1 1 1 2 1 1 1 ~ ~1 ~ 0 0 0 1 1 force @a
execute if entity @s[tag=portal1] at @s run particle minecraft:dust_color_transition 0 0.3 0.7 1.2 1 1 1 ^ ^2 ^-1 0 0 0 1 1 force @a

execute if entity @s[tag=portal1] at @s run particle minecraft:dust_color_transition 0 0.3 0.7 1.2 1 1 1 ^ ^ ^1 0 0 0 1 1 force @a
execute if entity @s[tag=portal1] at @s run tp @s ~ ~ ~ ~9 ~
